maker: Model originally by Jean-Claude Duplessis the Elder, Painted reserves attributed to Charles-Eloi Asselin, Reserve "Mentor at Salentum" from engraving by Jean-Baptiste Tilliard, et al
title: Wine Bottle Cooler (seau à bouteille ordinaire)
description: Wine Bottle Cooler (seau à bouteille ordinaire); Model originally by Jean-Claude Duplessis the Elder (French, about 1695 - 1774), Painted reserves attributed to Charles-Eloi Asselin (French, 1742 - 1803), Reserve "Mentor at Salentum" from engraving by Jean-Baptiste Tilliard (French, 1686 - 1766), et al; Sèvres, France; 1790; Soft-paste porcelain, with beau bleu ground color, polychrome enamel decoration and gilding; 18.9 × 25.9 cm (7 7/16 × 10 3/16 in.); 82.DE.5; J. Paul Getty Museum, Los Angeles, California
